title: Bonus: Thanksgiving Binge
description:
Lisa chats with Patrick Wyman of Tides of History about their favorite episodes on each other's podcasts!

Feast on these shows @ www.Wondery.com/Thanksgiving  


Real Crime Profile Binge:

Dirty John - Ep 1

Real Crime Profile - Profiling Dirty John

Happier with Gretchen Rubin

Ted Talks Daily

The Tim Ferriss Show


Tides of History Binge:

The History of Rome by Mike Duncan - Ep 36

Hardcore History - Ep 56 King of Kings, Part 1

Pardon My Take - Most recent episode

Chapo Trap House - Ep 58

Storm of Spoilers - Season 7 Wrap-Up Special
